name: Warehouse Simulator: Forklift Driver
description:
Meet the realistic forklift driver simulator in modern warehouses and distribution centers!

Manage specialized equipment used in warehouses and become a professional in your field. The project is a complete training platform for forklift drivers. And the well-developed mechanics of the movement of specialized warehouse equipment allows you to experience the sensations of working in a warehouse without leaving your computer.


All tasks are performed with maximum accuracy to the processes used in warehouses

There are already 3 types of tasks available in the game, which are present in most real warehouses:
  • Acceptance of pallets with goods
  • Placement of pallets with goods
  • Selection and shipment of pallets with goods
